official_title: COMET Study 2: Effects of Cigarette and E-cigarette Flavor Restrictions on Cigarette Demand and Substitution in the Experimental Tobacco Marketplace
inclusion_criteria:
* currently smoke at least 10 cigarettes per day
* have smoked at least 100 cigarettes (lifetime), and
* are 21 years of age or older.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria: * inaccurate identification of usual brand of cigarette's as menthol or non-menthol
